predicate.note: Frames file for 'short-circuit' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4.

example.name: usually ergative
example.text: When the swaying of the building woke me up, I reasoned that a) I was in Southern California; b) the bed was moving; c) it must be a Magic Fingers bed that [*T*-1] had short-circuited.
